statements: SELECT * FROM designer_profiles;
SELECT name, age FROM designer_profiles WHERE nationality = 'USA';
SELECT id, name, age, nationality FROM designer_profiles ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, portfolio_url FROM designer_profiles WHERE age < 30;
SELECT id, description FROM designer_profiles WHERE nationality = 'France';
SELECT * FROM designer_profiles WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, nationality, portfolio_url FROM designer_profiles WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 40 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT id, name, nationality, description FROM designer_profiles WHERE nationality='Italian' OR nationality='French' ORDER BY id;
SELECT id, name, age FROM designer_profiles WHERE age > 18 AND age < 30 ORDER BY age, name;
SELECT * FROM designer_profiles WHERE description LIKE '%creative%' OR description LIKE '%innovative%' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM designer_profiles;
SELECT designer_name, bio FROM designer_profiles;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM designer_portfolios;
SELECT * FROM designer_profiles WHERE designer_id = 1;
SELECT designer_name, contact_email FROM designer_profiles;
SELECT * FROM designer_profiles WHERE designer_id = 1;
SELECT designer_name, contact_email FROM designer_profiles WHERE designer_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM designer_portfolios WHERE project_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM designer_profiles ORDER BY designer_name ASC, designer_id DESC;

SELECT designer_profiles.designer_name, designer_portfolios.project_name FROM designer_profiles JOIN designer_portfolios ON designer_profiles.designer_id = designer_portfolios.designer_id ORDER BY designer_profiles.designer_name, designer_portfolios.project_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM designer_profiles;
SELECT name, age FROM designer_profiles ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT designer_id, portfolio_name FROM designer_portfolios WHERE designer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM designer_past_work WHERE year_completed BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020 ORDER BY year_completed ASC;
SELECT id, work_name, description FROM designer_past_work ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM designer_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, location FROM designer_profiles WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT designer_portfolios.portfolio_name, designer_past_work.work_name FROM designer_portfolios INNER JOIN designer_past_work ON designer_portfolios.designer_id = designer_past_work.designer_id;
SELECT id, name, portfolio_name, creation_date FROM designer_profiles JOIN designer_portfolios ON designer_profiles.id = designer_portfolios.designer_id;
SELECT * FROM designer_past_work WHERE year_completed > 2010 AND description LIKE '%innovative%';
SELECT * FROM designer_profiles;
SELECT designer_name, designer_email FROM designer_profiles;
SELECT designer_name, designer_bio FROM designer_profiles WHERE designer_id = 1;
SELECT portfolio_title, portfolio_description FROM designer_portfolios WHERE designer_id = 2;
SELECT show_name, show_date, show_location FROM fashion_shows;
SELECT * FROM designer_profiles;
SELECT designer_name, designer_email FROM designer_profiles ORDER BY designer_name DESC;
SELECT designer_name, designer_phone, designer_bio FROM designer_profiles WHERE designer_id = 2;
SELECT designer_name, portfolio_title, year_completed FROM designer_profiles JOIN designer_portfolios ON designer_profiles.designer_id = designer_portfolios.designer_id;
SELECT show_name, show_date, designer_name FROM fashion_shows JOIN designer_profiles ON fashion_shows.designer_id = designer_profiles.designer_id WHERE show_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM DesignerProfiles;
SELECT designer_name, designer_location FROM DesignerProfiles;
SELECT designer_id, designer_bio FROM DesignerProfiles WHERE designer_age > 30;
SELECT portfolio_name FROM DesignerPortfolios ORDER BY portfolio_id DESC;
SELECT show_name, show_location, show_date FROM FashionShows WHERE show_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT designer_name, designer_location FROM DesignerProfiles;
SELECT designer_name, designer_age, designer_location FROM DesignerProfiles ORDER BY designer_age DESC;
SELECT d.designer_name, p.portfolio_name, w.work_title FROM DesignerProfiles d JOIN DesignerPortfolios p ON d.designer_id = p.designer_id JOIN PastWorks w ON d.designer_id = w.designer_id;
SELECT * FROM DesignerPortfolios WHERE designer_id = 2;
SELECT show_id, designer_id, outfit_description FROM DesignerShows WHERE show_outfit_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY show_id ASC, designer_id DESC;
